reviewText: can only be played on computer and last disc won't play at all...... very disappointed.

The first disc of three gave an error message stating the region was incorrect.  The series has been returned.  I hope to find an album that will play. The situation caused me to wonder if the album was piracy.
It took a bit of time getting this to play on our DVD..formatting issues I think.  Finally...  we all enjoyed it

Taylor Caldwell is one of my favorite authors. I would recommend any of her books including Great Lion of God or Dear and Glorious Physician
